column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=The last time I went grocery shopping , I had a list of things I needed to buy .
#text=My teenage son needed ingredients for yakisoba for a potluck dinner that his Japanese class at school was having .
#text=For this I needed refrigerated yakisoba noodles , green onions , and chicken .
#text=We were also out of eggs , bread , and few other things .
#text=My list was written on a post-it note stuck to my refrigerator .
#text=I took the note , got my purse , and drove to the store .
#text=The store is only about 5 minutes away but it was raining , so I did n't want to walk .
#text=I got a small cart because I was n't buying very many things .
#text=Just inside the entrance to the store is the bread section , so I got that first .
#text=Then I bought some chicken breasts , got a package of 18 eggs , and went to find where the yakisoba noodles are kept .
#text=I had n't bought them from that store before .
#text=I had to walk around a little bit , but I finally found them and got two packages .
#text=Then I walked to the self-checkout area , swiped my grocery store card so that I would get any member discounts , and checked out and bagged my groceries .
#text=I paid with an ATM card and carried the groceries out to the car .
#text=I put them on the passenger seat in front .
